argument.description: Is an expression of any character type (nvarchar, varchar, nchar, char).
Is a expression of any character type containing characters that should be replaced.
Is a character expression that matches second argument by type and length.

returnType: Returns a character expression of the same type as inputString where characters from the second argument are replaced with the matching characters from third argument.
description: Returns the string provided as a first argument after some characters specified in the second argument are translated into a destination set of characters.
